title: WTT/WTB:  My Red Cobb (SGC 5) for your Red/Bat Off Cobb (PSA 4-5)
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTT/WTB:  My Red Cobb (SGC 5) for your Red/Bat Off Cobb (PSA 4-5)
posts.post_content:
Finally at 519/520 in PSA 4.0 - 5.0 for the Monster, with just a few things to clean up for the set.
Last card is the Bat Off Cobb, and then have 4 others that I need to move from SGC to PSA for a complete PSA set of 520.

Offered is this beautiful, dead-centered SGC 5 Red Cobb that I would trade to acquire either of the 2 Cobbs on my list (Red or Bat Off) in PSA 4 - 5 grade.  Cash to even it out, whatever is fair.
Also have some other in-demand (Non-PreWar) cards in the hobby that I am considering moving as well (See Pics).  Willing to build them into a trade as well.

I am not considering an outright sale on the Red Cobb.

Outside of the Cobbs, just need a Lajoie (Throwing), Bender (w/ Trees), and a Tom Needham in PSA 4.0 -5.0 to replace SGC copies.  Happy to buy these outright if you have them.

See pics below -- all help is appreciated!
